item.title: I-94 East - Use Exit 213 for Regina Canada
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 213. Use Exit 213 for Regina, Canada (via MT-16 North).

item.title: I-94 East - Glendive Exits
item.description: Glendive exits on I-94 east. MT-200S/Circle, MT-16/Sidney, and City Center.

item.title: MT-16 North/MT-5 West at MT-16 North
item.description: MT-16 North/MT-5 West at MT-16 North to Raymond and Regina (SK, Canada). Raymond is the US Port of Entry on MT-16.

item.title: MT-16 North/MT-5 West Approaching Split
item.description: MT-16 North/MT-5 West Approaching MT-16/MT-5 split in Plentywood.

item.title: MT-5 West/MT-16 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on MT-5 West/MT-16 North. Distance to Plentywood, Scobey (via MT-5), and Regina (SK, Canada via MT-16).

item.title: MT-16 North at MT-5
item.description: MT-16 north at MT-5. Use MT-5 east to Westby. MT-5 west joins MT-16 north through Plentywood.

item.title: MT-16 North Approaching MTS-573
item.description: MT-16 North approaching MTS-573 in Medicine Lake.

item.title: MT-16 North at MTS-350 West
item.description: MT-16 North at MTS-350 West to Homestead.

item.title: MT-16 North at MTS-405
item.description: MT-16 North at MTS-405 to Froid.

item.title: MT-16 North - Port of Raymond Distance
item.description: Distance to Port of Raymond (border with Canada) on MT-16 north. The Port of Raymond is a 24 hour Port of Entry.

item.title: MT-16 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MT-16 north. Distance to Froid and Plentywood.

item.title: US-2 West at MT-16 North
item.description: US-2 West at MT-16 North. Turn right for MT-16 north; continue straight for US-2 West/MT-16 South.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching MT-16
item.description: US-2 West Approaching MT-16 north to Plentywood. MT-16 south joins US-2 west through Culbertson. Use US-2 west for Wolf Point and Sidney (via MT-16 south).

item.title: US-2 West - Port of Entry Information For MT-16
item.description: US-2 West - Regina Canada 24 Hour Port of Entry, via MT-16 north. The next 24 hour port of entry westbound into Canada is on I-15 at Sweetgrass.

item.title: MT-200 East/MT-16 North Split - Sidney
item.description: MT-200 East/MT-16 North Split in Sidney. Turn left for MT-16 north to Regina (SK, Canada) and Culbertson. Continue straight for MT-200 East to Fairview.

item.title: MT-200 East/MT-16 North - Sidney Truck Route
item.description: MT-200 East/MT-16 North at 14th St. Use 14th St. east for the truck route through Sidney.

item.title: MT-200 East/MT-16 North at Sidney Truck Route
item.description: MT-200 East/MT-16 North at Sidney Truck Route. Continue on MT-200/MT-16 for Fairview.

item.title: MT-200 East at MT-16 and MT-23
item.description: MT-200 East at MT-16 and MT-23. Turn right for MT-16 south to Glendive. Continue straight for MT-23 east to Watford City (ND); left for MT-16 North/MT-200 East to Sidney.

item.title: MT-200 East Approaching MT-16/MT-23 Junction
item.description: MT-200 East Approaching MT-16/MT-23 Junction in Richland County.
